Battlewise Valor.flavor: It's never good to walk into an ambush, but with the right spell you might walk out again.
Battlewise Valor.name: Battlewise Valor
Battlewise Valor.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Cavalry Pegasus.flavor: "It is hope, hooved and winged." —Cymede, queen of Akros
Cavalry Pegasus.name: Cavalry Pegasus
Cavalry Pegasus.text:
Flying
Whenever Cavalry Pegasus attacks, each attacking Human gains flying until end of turn.

Celestial Archon.name: Celestial Archon
Celestial Archon.text:
Bestow {5}{W}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Flying, first strike
Enchanted creature gets +4/+4 and has flying and first strike.

Chained to the Rocks.name: Chained to the Rocks
Chained to the Rocks.text:
Enchant Mountain you control
When Chained to the Rocks enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Chained to the Rocks leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

Chosen by Heliod.flavor: "Training and studies aid a soldier in meager amounts. The gods do the rest." —Brigone, soldier of Meletis
Chosen by Heliod.name: Chosen by Heliod
Chosen by Heliod.text:
Enchant creature
When Chosen by Heliod enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.

Dauntless Onslaught.flavor: "The people of Akros must learn from our leonin adversaries. If we match their staunch ferocity with our superior faith, we cannot fail." —Cymede, queen of Akros
Dauntless Onslaught.name: Dauntless Onslaught
Dauntless Onslaught.text: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.

Decorated Griffin.flavor: The awards and medals of polis-dwellers mean nothing to griffins, but they repay acts of generosity.
Decorated Griffin.name: Decorated Griffin
Decorated Griffin.text:
Flying
{1}{W}: Prevent the next 1 combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

Divine Verdict.flavor: The last thing to go through the cyclops's mind was a twelve-ton block of marble.
Divine Verdict.name: Divine Verdict
Divine Verdict.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

Elspeth, Sun's Champion.name: Elspeth, Sun's Champion
Elspeth, Sun's Champion.text:
+1: Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
−3: Destroy all creatures with power 4 or greater.
−7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have flying."

Ephara's Warden.flavor: "When you threaten the sanctity of the polis, you insult Ephara herself. If she doesn't smite you, I will."
Ephara's Warden.name: Ephara's Warden
Ephara's Warden.text: {T}: Tap target creature with power 3 or less.

Evangel of Heliod.name: Evangel of Heliod
Evangel of Heliod.text: When Evangel of Heliod enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens equal to your devotion to white. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)

Fabled Hero.flavor: "You. Poet. Be sure to write this down."
Fabled Hero.name: Fabled Hero
Fabled Hero.text:
Double strike
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Fabled Hero, put a +1/+1 counter on Fabled Hero.

Favored Hoplite.name: Favored Hoplite
Favored Hoplite.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Favored Hoplite, put a +1/+1 counter on Favored Hoplite and prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn.

Gift of Immortality.name: Gift of Immortality
Gift of Immortality.text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. Return Gift of Immortality to the battlefield attached to that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

Glare of Heresy.flavor: No foe is more hated than the former friend.
Glare of Heresy.name: Glare of Heresy

Gods Willing.flavor: Honor the gods of Theros, and they will return the favor.
Gods Willing.name: Gods Willing
Gods Willing.text: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Heliod, God of the Sun.name: Heliod, God of the Sun
Heliod, God of the Sun.text:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to white is less than five, Heliod isn't a creature. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)
Other creatures you control have vigilance.
{2}{W}{W}: Create a 2/1 white Cleric enchantment creature token.

Heliod's Emissary.name: Heliod's Emissary
Heliod's Emissary.text:
Bestow {6}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Whenever Heliod's Emissary or enchanted creature attacks, tap target creature an opponent controls.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.

Hopeful Eidolon.name: Hopeful Eidolon
Hopeful Eidolon.text:
Bestow {3}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has lifelink.

Hundred-Handed One.name: Hundred-Handed One
Hundred-Handed One.text:
Vigilance
{3}{W}{W}{W}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
As long as Hundred-Handed One is monstrous, it has reach and can block an additional ninety-nine creatures each combat.

Lagonna-Band Elder.flavor: "The best lessons are not the ones I teach. They are the ones the pupils realize for themselves."
Lagonna-Band Elder.name: Lagonna-Band Elder
Lagonna-Band Elder.text: When Lagonna-Band Elder enters the battlefield, if you control an enchantment, you gain 3 life.

Last Breath.flavor: In time, all things turn to dust. Some things just take less time.
Last Breath.name: Last Breath
Last Breath.text: Exile target creature with power 2 or less. Its controller gains 4 life.

Leonin Snarecaster.flavor: Formerly oppressed by the polis of Meletis, leonin occasionally "mistake" their old enemies for game.
Leonin Snarecaster.name: Leonin Snarecaster
Leonin Snarecaster.text: When Leonin Snarecaster enters the battlefield, you may tap target creature.

Observant Alseid.name: Observant Alseid
Observant Alseid.text:
Bestow {4}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Vigilance
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.

Ordeal of Heliod.name: Ordeal of Heliod
Ordeal of Heliod.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Heliod.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Heliod, you gain 10 life.

Phalanx Leader.flavor: His soldiers etch his words on the insides of their shields, their inspiration always in sight during battle.
Phalanx Leader.name: Phalanx Leader
Phalanx Leader.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Phalanx Leader, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

Ray of Dissolution.flavor: The works of one god last only as long as the patience of another.
Ray of Dissolution.name: Ray of Dissolution
Ray of Dissolution.text: Destroy target enchantment. You gain 3 life.

Scholar of Athreos.flavor: She asks pointed questions of the dead who wait for Athreos, learning of life from those who are about to leave it.
Scholar of Athreos.name: Scholar of Athreos
Scholar of Athreos.text: {2}{B}: Each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

Setessan Battle Priest.flavor: "Your god teaches you only how to kill. Karametra teaches me to defend what I hold dear. That is why I will prevail."
Setessan Battle Priest.name: Setessan Battle Priest
Setessan Battle Priest.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Setessan Battle Priest, you gain 2 life.

Setessan Griffin.flavor: Most griffins must be caught and broken into the service of the polis. Not so in Setessa, where they volunteer.
Setessan Griffin.name: Setessan Griffin
Setessan Griffin.text:
Flying
{2}{G}{G}: Setessan Griffin gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

Silent Artisan.flavor: On the fourth day they passed through a forest of immense stacked stones. Althemone, youngest of the companions, called these pillars the work of a god, but the Champion knew better. She quickened her pace. —The Theriad
Silent Artisan.name: Silent Artisan

Soldier of the Pantheon.flavor: "I hear the gods' voices in my dreams each night, and I offer bloody trophies on their altars each day."
Soldier of the Pantheon.name: Soldier of the Pantheon
Soldier of the Pantheon.text:
Protection from multicolored
Whenever an opponent casts a multicolored spell, you gain 1 life.

Spear of Heliod.flavor: Legend speaks of the Sun Spear, the mighty weapon that can strike any point in Theros, even the depths of the Underworld.
Spear of Heliod.name: Spear of Heliod
Spear of Heliod.text:
Creatures you control get +1/+1.
{1}{W}{W}, {T}: Destroy target creature that dealt damage to you this turn.

Traveling Philosopher.flavor: The Champion and the philosopher Olexa returned from the opposing camp at dusk. Behind them, the enemy raised sail and departed, breaking the siege. When asked what the two had done, the Champion replied, "We spoke to them." —The Theriad
Traveling Philosopher.name: Traveling Philosopher

Vanquish the Foul.name: Vanquish the Foul
Vanquish the Foul.text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Wingsteed Rider.flavor: Trust is the only bridle a pegasus will accept.
Wingsteed Rider.name: Wingsteed Rider
Wingsteed Rider.text:
Flying
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Wingsteed Rider, put a +1/+1 counter on Wingsteed Rider.

Yoked Ox.flavor: It was in fields of grain, not fields of battle, that the Champion learned to bear the yoke of duty to the gods. She worked the land long before she was called on to defend it. —The Theriad
Yoked Ox.name: Yoked Ox

Annul.flavor: "Why pray to the gods, who feed on your worship? Dissolve your illusions and see the true nature of things." —Xenagos, the Reveler
Annul.name: Annul
Annul.text: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.

Aqueous Form.name: Aqueous Form
Aqueous Form.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked.
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Artisan of Forms.name: Artisan of Forms
Artisan of Forms.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Artisan of Forms, you may have Artisan of Forms become a copy of target creature, except it has this ability.

Benthic Giant.flavor: "Some fates you can see coming for you, plain as day, and there's nothing you can do about them." —Callaphe the mariner
Benthic Giant.name: Benthic Giant
Benthic Giant.text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Bident of Thassa.flavor: The wills of mortals shift as the tide ebbs and flows.
Bident of Thassa.name: Bident of Thassa
Bident of Thassa.text:
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
{1}{U}, {T}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.

Breaching Hippocamp.flavor: Don't try to ride this steed unless you've got gills too.
Breaching Hippocamp.name: Breaching Hippocamp
Breaching Hippocamp.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Breaching Hippocamp enters the battlefield, untap another target creature you control.

Coastline Chimera.flavor: Seeing a chimera overhead foretells good fortune, but only because seeing one any closer foretells dismemberment.
Coastline Chimera.name: Coastline Chimera
Coastline Chimera.text:
Flying
{1}{W}: Coastline Chimera can block an additional creature this turn.

Crackling Triton.flavor: He calls upon both the currents in the sea and the current in the clouds.
Crackling Triton.name: Crackling Triton
Crackling Triton.text: {2}{R}, Sacrifice Crackling Triton: Crackling Triton deals 2 damage to any target.

Curse of the Swine.flavor: Another imminent battle subsided in busy snuffling and carefree rooting.
Curse of the Swine.name: Curse of the Swine
Curse of the Swine.text: Exile X target creatures. For each creature exiled this way, its controller creates a 2/2 green Boar creature token.

Dissolve.flavor: "You thought only the gods could stop you?"
Dissolve.name: Dissolve
Dissolve.text: Counter target spell. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Fate Foretold.flavor: The tale of her life was already written, but that didn't mean she could predict the ending.
Fate Foretold.name: Fate Foretold
Fate Foretold.text:
Enchant creature
When Fate Foretold enters the battlefield, draw a card.
When enchanted creature dies, its controller draws a card.

Gainsay.flavor: "You dryfolk must take the air for granted. You constantly insist on wasting it." —Kenessos, priest of Thassa
Gainsay.name: Gainsay

Griptide.flavor: When the sea god Thassa wishes to speak with a mortal, she does not issue a summons or grant a vision requesting a visit. The sea simply brings her guest before her.
Griptide.name: Griptide
Griptide.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

Horizon Scholar.name: Horizon Scholar
Horizon Scholar.text:
Flying
When Horizon Scholar enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

Lost in a Labyrinth.flavor: Even those who leave the labyrinth never escape it, forever dreaming of their time trapped within.
Lost in a Labyrinth.name: Lost in a Labyrinth
Lost in a Labyrinth.text: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Master of Waves.name: Master of Waves
Master of Waves.text:
Protection from red
Elemental creatures you control get +1/+1.
When Master of Waves enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/0 blue Elemental creature tokens equal to your devotion to blue. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)

Meletis Charlatan.flavor: "Every object has an echo in the Æther beyond the world. Every idea has a shadow that can be brought to light."
Meletis Charlatan.name: Meletis Charlatan
Meletis Charlatan.text: {2}{U}, {T}: The controller of target instant or sorcery spell copies it. That player may choose new targets for the copy.

Mnemonic Wall.flavor: "It augments anamnesis. What is so confusing about that?" —Perisophia the philosopher
Mnemonic Wall.name: Mnemonic Wall
Mnemonic Wall.text:
Defender
When Mnemonic Wall enters the battlefield, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

Nimbus Naiad.name: Nimbus Naiad
Nimbus Naiad.text:
Bestow {4}{U} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Flying
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.

Omenspeaker.flavor: Her prophecies amaze her even as she speaks them.
Omenspeaker.name: Omenspeaker
Omenspeaker.text: When Omenspeaker enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

Ordeal of Thassa.name: Ordeal of Thassa
Ordeal of Thassa.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Thassa.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Thassa, draw two cards.

Prescient Chimera.name: Prescient Chimera
Prescient Chimera.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Prognostic Sphinx.name: Prognostic Sphinx
Prognostic Sphinx.text:
Flying
Discard a card: Prognostic Sphinx gains hexproof until end of turn. Tap it.
Whenever Prognostic Sphinx attacks, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

Sea God's Revenge.flavor: "What has neither mouth nor throat, yet swallows captain, crew, and boat?" —Sphinx's riddle
Sea God's Revenge.name: Sea God's Revenge
Sea God's Revenge.text: Return up to three target creatures your opponents control to their owners' hands. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Sealock Monster.name: Sealock Monster
Sealock Monster.text:
Sealock Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
{5}{U}{U}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Sealock Monster becomes monstrous, target land becomes an Island in addition to its other types.

Shipbreaker Kraken.name: Shipbreaker Kraken
Shipbreaker Kraken.text:
{6}{U}{U}: Monstrosity 4. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Shipbreaker Kraken becomes monstrous, tap up to four target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps for as long as you control Shipbreaker Kraken.

Stymied Hopes.flavor: When a god's will is against you, the day never ends well.
Stymied Hopes.name: Stymied Hopes
Stymied Hopes.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Swan Song.flavor: "The most enlightened mages create beauty from violence." —Medomai the Ageless
Swan Song.name: Swan Song
Swan Song.text: Counter target enchantment, instant, or sorcery spell. Its controller creates a 2/2 blue Bird creature token with flying.

Thassa, God of the Sea.name: Thassa, God of the Sea
Thassa, God of the Sea.text:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to blue is less than five, Thassa isn't a creature. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1.
{1}{U}: Target creature you control can't be blocked this turn.

Thassa's Bounty.flavor: "Was this gift cast adrift for any to find, or did Thassa guide the currents to bring it to me alone?" —Kenessos, priest of Thassa
Thassa's Bounty.name: Thassa's Bounty
Thassa's Bounty.text: Draw three cards. Target player puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.

Thassa's Emissary.name: Thassa's Emissary
Thassa's Emissary.text:
Bestow {5}{U} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Whenever Thassa's Emissary or enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.

Triton Fortune Hunter.flavor: "Thassa has blessed me with power and insight. I am careful not to disappoint her."
Triton Fortune Hunter.name: Triton Fortune Hunter
Triton Fortune Hunter.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Triton Fortune Hunter, draw a card.

Triton Shorethief.flavor: At sunrise, the Champion and her companions awoke to find their supplies gone and Brygus, their sentry, dead. Carefully arranged piles of ornamental shells gave a clear warning: go no further. —The Theriad
Triton Shorethief.name: Triton Shorethief

Triton Tactics.name: Triton Tactics
Triton Tactics.text: Up to two target creatures each get +0/+3 until end of turn. Untap those creatures. At this turn's next end of combat, tap each creature that was blocked by one of those creatures this turn and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

Vaporkin.flavor: "Mists are carefree. They drift where they will, unencumbered by rocks and river beds." —Thrasios, triton hero
Vaporkin.name: Vaporkin
Vaporkin.text:
Flying
Vaporkin can block only creatures with flying.

Voyage's End.flavor: Philosophers say those lost at sea ascended to a more perfect realm. Sailors say they drowned.
Voyage's End.name: Voyage's End
Voyage's End.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Wavecrash Triton.name: Wavecrash Triton
Wavecrash Triton.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Wavecrash Triton, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

Abhorrent Overlord.name: Abhorrent Overlord
Abhorrent Overlord.text:
Flying
When Abhorrent Overlord enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 black Harpy creature tokens with flying equal to your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.

Agent of the Fates.name: Agent of the Fates
Agent of the Fates.text:
Deathtouch
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Agent of the Fates, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

Asphodel Wanderer.flavor: He killed out of hate, so now only hate sustains him. He sought immortality, so the gods gave it to him.
Asphodel Wanderer.name: Asphodel Wanderer

Baleful Eidolon.name: Baleful Eidolon
Baleful Eidolon.text:
Bestow {4}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has deathtouch.

Blood-Toll Harpy.flavor: When harpies demand a toll to cross through their territory, consider yourself lucky if they permit payment in coin.
Blood-Toll Harpy.name: Blood-Toll Harpy
Blood-Toll Harpy.text:
Flying
When Blood-Toll Harpy enters the battlefield, each player loses 1 life.

Boon of Erebos.flavor: "Death is not a certainty. Erebos determines when a mortal's time is up." —Iadorna, death priest of Erebos
Boon of Erebos.name: Boon of Erebos
Boon of Erebos.text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Regenerate it. You lose 2 life.

Cavern Lampad.name: Cavern Lampad
Cavern Lampad.text:
Bestow {5}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has intimidate.

Cutthroat Maneuver.flavor: "Our ambition drives us forward. Together we will claim what is ours, no matter who holds it."
Cutthroat Maneuver.name: Cutthroat Maneuver
Cutthroat Maneuver.text: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn.

Dark Betrayal.flavor: "You're just like me: ruthless, cunning, and ambitious. Obviously you're a threat." —Basarios the Blade
Dark Betrayal.name: Dark Betrayal

Disciple of Phenax.name: Disciple of Phenax
Disciple of Phenax.text: When Disciple of Phenax enters the battlefield, target player reveals a number of cards from their hand equal to your devotion to black. You choose one of them. That player discards that card. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

Erebos, God of the Dead.name: Erebos, God of the Dead
Erebos, God of the Dead.text:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to black is less than five, Erebos isn't a creature. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)
Your opponents can't gain life.
{1}{B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.

Erebos's Emissary.name: Erebos's Emissary
Erebos's Emissary.text:
Bestow {5}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Discard a creature card: Erebos's Emissary gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If Erebos's Emissary is an Aura, enchanted creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn instead.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.

Felhide Minotaur.flavor: With spear held high, the Champion came to meet Thyrogog of the Ashlands, who wore the old king's skin as a cloak and fed on the flesh of innocents. The foul minotaur raised the great axe called Goremaster and charged. —The Theriad
Felhide Minotaur.name: Felhide Minotaur

Fleshmad Steed.flavor: More disturbing than the unknown is a distortion of the familiar.
Fleshmad Steed.name: Fleshmad Steed
Fleshmad Steed.text: Whenever another creature dies, tap Fleshmad Steed.

Gray Merchant of Asphodel.name: Gray Merchant of Asphodel
Gray Merchant of Asphodel.text: When Gray Merchant of Asphodel enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life, where X is your devotion to black. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

Hero's Downfall.flavor: Destiny exalts a chosen few, but even heroes break.
Hero's Downfall.name: Hero's Downfall

Hythonia the Cruel.name: Hythonia the Cruel
Hythonia the Cruel.text:
Deathtouch
{6}{B}{B}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Hythonia the Cruel becomes monstrous, destroy all non-Gorgon creatures.

Insatiable Harpy.flavor: Gold coin, battered helmet, broken wrist bone—all have the same value in the eyes of a harpy.
Insatiable Harpy.name: Insatiable Harpy

Keepsake Gorgon.name: Keepsake Gorgon
Keepsake Gorgon.text:
Deathtouch
{5}{B}{B}: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Keepsake Gorgon becomes monstrous, destroy target non-Gorgon creature an opponent controls.

Lash of the Whip.flavor: "No matter who their fickle hearts worship, all mortals belong to one god in the end." —Iadorna, death priest of Erebos
Lash of the Whip.name: Lash of the Whip
Lash of the Whip.text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

Loathsome Catoblepas.name: Loathsome Catoblepas
Loathsome Catoblepas.text:
{2}{G}: Loathsome Catoblepas must be blocked this turn if able.
When Loathsome Catoblepas dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

March of the Returned.flavor: The Returned have no memory of the Underworld or of their former lives. The golden masks they wear are the last gifts of the selves they left behind.
March of the Returned.name: March of the Returned
March of the Returned.text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

Mogis's Marauder.name: Mogis's Marauder
Mogis's Marauder.text: When Mogis's Marauder enters the battlefield, up to X target creatures each gain intimidate and haste until end of turn, where X is your devotion to black. (A creature with intimidate can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it. Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

Nighthowler.name: Nighthowler
Nighthowler.text:
Bestow {2}{B}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Nighthowler and enchanted creature each get +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

Ordeal of Erebos.name: Ordeal of Erebos
Ordeal of Erebos.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Erebos.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Erebos, target player discards two cards.

Pharika's Cure.flavor: "The venom cleanses the sickness from your body, but it will not be pleasant, and you may not survive. Pharika's blessings are fickle." —Solon, acolyte of Pharika
Pharika's Cure.name: Pharika's Cure
Pharika's Cure.text: Pharika's Cure deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

Read the Bones.flavor: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.
Read the Bones.name: Read the Bones
Read the Bones.text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

Rescue from the Underworld.name: Rescue from the Underworld
Rescue from the Underworld.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Choose target creature card in your graveyard. Return that card and the sacrificed card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of your next upkeep. Exile Rescue from the Underworld.

Returned Centaur.flavor: Driven away by his living kin, he wanders mourning through the wilderness, seeking the dead city of Asphodel.
Returned Centaur.name: Returned Centaur
Returned Centaur.text: When Returned Centaur enters the battlefield, target player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard.

Returned Phalanx.flavor: They lived in different nations and fought in different eras, but as the Returned, they link arms as one.
Returned Phalanx.name: Returned Phalanx
Returned Phalanx.text:
Defender
{1}{U}: Returned Phalanx can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

Scourgemark.flavor: To members of the cult of Erebos, gold-infused tattoos symbolize the inevitable grasp of the god of death.
Scourgemark.name: Scourgemark
Scourgemark.text:
Enchant creature
When Scourgemark enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0.

Sip of Hemlock.flavor: Conspirators poisoned the oracle not because her visions were wrong, but because they were right.
Sip of Hemlock.name: Sip of Hemlock
Sip of Hemlock.text: Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.

Thoughtseize.flavor: "Knowledge is such a burden. Release it. Release all your fears to me." —Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver
Thoughtseize.name: Thoughtseize
Thoughtseize.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

Tormented Hero.name: Tormented Hero
Tormented Hero.text:
Tormented Hero enters the battlefield tapped.
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Tormented Hero, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

Viper's Kiss.flavor: "I could heal a snakebite. Looks like you got bitten by a constellation." —Aescalos, healer of Pharika
Viper's Kiss.name: Viper's Kiss
Viper's Kiss.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

Whip of Erebos.name: Whip of Erebos
Whip of Erebos.text:
Creatures you control have lifelink.
{2}{B}{B}, {T}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. If it would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

Akroan Crusader.flavor: An Akroan soldier's worth is measured by the number of swords raised by his battle cry.
Akroan Crusader.name: Akroan Crusader
Akroan Crusader.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Crusader, create a 1/1 red Soldier creature token with haste.

Anger of the Gods.flavor: There was no reason to pray. This was already an act of the gods.
Anger of the Gods.name: Anger of the Gods
Anger of the Gods.text: Anger of the Gods deals 3 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

Arena Athlete.flavor: The Iroan Games award no medals. Athletes vie for a visit from Iroas, god of victory.
Arena Athlete.name: Arena Athlete
Arena Athlete.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Arena Athlete, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.

Borderland Minotaur.flavor: "You have led us to triumph over the forces of Mogis!" said Brygus the Brave, clapping the Champion on the back. The Champion wiped the sweat and blood from her brow. "I count eight graves," she said. "Too many to call this a victory." —The Theriad
Borderland Minotaur.name: Borderland Minotaur

Boulderfall.flavor: "Defeating the Meletians was not so difficult. I needed only to move a mountain." —Eocles, oracle of Purphoros
Boulderfall.name: Boulderfall
Boulderfall.text: Boulderfall deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

Coordinated Assault.flavor: It's hard to shout "Shields up!" with a javelin in your chest.
Coordinated Assault.name: Coordinated Assault
Coordinated Assault.text: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

Deathbellow Raider.flavor: "The temple has been rededicated. It belongs to Mogis now." —Rastos, disciple of Mogis
Deathbellow Raider.name: Deathbellow Raider
Deathbellow Raider.text:
Deathbellow Raider attacks each combat if able.
{2}{B}: Regenerate Deathbellow Raider.

Demolish.flavor: "When fire is shackled to candle and torch, subjected to insignificance, it finds a way to lash out at its masters." —Vala, disciple of Purphoros
Demolish.name: Demolish

Dragon Mantle.name: Dragon Mantle
Dragon Mantle.text:
Enchant creature
When Dragon Mantle enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

Ember Swallower.name: Ember Swallower
Ember Swallower.text:
{5}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Ember Swallower becomes monstrous, each player sacrifices three lands.

Fanatic of Mogis.name: Fanatic of Mogis
Fanatic of Mogis.text: When Fanatic of Mogis enters the battlefield, it deals damage to each opponent equal to your devotion to red. (Each {R} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to red.)

Firedrinker Satyr.flavor: Attending a satyr revel requires a high tolerance for pain.
Firedrinker Satyr.name: Firedrinker Satyr
Firedrinker Satyr.text:
Whenever Firedrinker Satyr is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.
{1}{R}: Firedrinker Satyr gets +1/+0 until end of turn and deals 1 damage to you.

Flamespeaker Adept.flavor: "I see your future, mantled in ash."
Flamespeaker Adept.name: Flamespeaker Adept
Flamespeaker Adept.text: Whenever you scry, Flamespeaker Adept gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

Hammer of Purphoros.flavor: All the world is Purphoros's anvil.
Hammer of Purphoros.name: Hammer of Purphoros
Hammer of Purphoros.text:
Creatures you control have haste.
{2}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Create a 3/3 colorless Golem enchantment artifact creature token.

Ill-Tempered Cyclops.flavor: A cyclops has two moods: angry and asleep.
Ill-Tempered Cyclops.name: Ill-Tempered Cyclops
Ill-Tempered Cyclops.text:
Trample
{5}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

Labyrinth Champion.flavor: "It used to be a lair. Now it's just a tunnel."
Labyrinth Champion.name: Labyrinth Champion
Labyrinth Champion.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Labyrinth Champion, Labyrinth Champion deals 2 damage to any target.

Lightning Strike.flavor: "The hand of Keranos can be seen in every rumbling storm cloud. Best not to stand where he points." —Rakleia of Shrine Peak
Lightning Strike.name: Lightning Strike
Lightning Strike.text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.

Magma Jet.name: Magma Jet
Magma Jet.text: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to any target. Scry 2.

Messenger's Speed.flavor: "He outran arrows. He outran even the archers' insults." —Bayma, storyteller of Lagonna Band
Messenger's Speed.name: Messenger's Speed
Messenger's Speed.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has trample and haste.

Minotaur Skullcleaver.flavor: "Their only dreams are of full stomachs." —Kleon the Iron-Booted
Minotaur Skullcleaver.name: Minotaur Skullcleaver
Minotaur Skullcleaver.text:
Haste
When Minotaur Skullcleaver enters the battlefield, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

Ordeal of Purphoros.name: Ordeal of Purphoros
Ordeal of Purphoros.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Purphoros.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Purphoros, it deals 3 damage to any target.

Peak Eruption.flavor: "Early olive buds? A good omen. Flock of crows? Not so good. Mountain exploding? Bad. Very, very bad." —Hira, street oracle
Peak Eruption.name: Peak Eruption
Peak Eruption.text: Destroy target Mountain. Peak Eruption deals 3 damage to that land's controller.

Portent of Betrayal.name: Portent of Betrayal
Portent of Betrayal.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Priest of Iroas.flavor: "Even my last breath will be a blow struck for Iroas."
Priest of Iroas.name: Priest of Iroas
Priest of Iroas.text: {3}{W}, Sacrifice Priest of Iroas: Destroy target enchantment.

Purphoros, God of the Forge.name: Purphoros, God of the Forge
Purphoros, God of the Forge.text:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to red is less than five, Purphoros isn't a creature.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Purphoros deals 2 damage to each opponent.
{2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

Purphoros's Emissary.name: Purphoros's Emissary
Purphoros's Emissary.text:
Bestow {6}{R} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has menace.

Rage of Purphoros.name: Rage of Purphoros
Rage of Purphoros.text: Rage of Purphoros deals 4 damage to target creature. It can't be regenerated this turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Rageblood Shaman.flavor: "I see a spark of pure rage. Soon that spark will spread from the depths of Kragma. Soon its fire will engulf the polis." —Hira, street oracle
Rageblood Shaman.name: Rageblood Shaman
Rageblood Shaman.text:
Trample
Other Minotaur creatures you control get +1/+1 and have trample.

Satyr Rambler.flavor: A satyr is bound by nothing—not home, not family, not loyalty.
Satyr Rambler.name: Satyr Rambler

Spark Jolt.flavor: Acolytes of Purphoros hammer the world until they see the sparks of change.
Spark Jolt.name: Spark Jolt
Spark Jolt.text: Spark Jolt deals 1 damage to any target. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Spearpoint Oread.name: Spearpoint Oread
Spearpoint Oread.text:
Bestow {5}{R} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
First strike
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has first strike.

Stoneshock Giant.name: Stoneshock Giant
Stoneshock Giant.text:
{6}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Stoneshock Giant becomes monstrous, creatures without flying your opponents control can't block this turn.

Stormbreath Dragon.name: Stormbreath Dragon
Stormbreath Dragon.text:
Flying, haste, protection from white
{5}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Stormbreath Dragon becomes monstrous, it deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

Titan of Eternal Fire.flavor: There is no gift more precious or more perilous than fire.
Titan of Eternal Fire.name: Titan of Eternal Fire
Titan of Eternal Fire.text: Each Human creature you control has "{R}, {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."

Titan's Strength.name: Titan's Strength
Titan's Strength.text: Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Two-Headed Cerberus.flavor: The left head keeps the right head starved as motivation to track new prey.
Two-Headed Cerberus.name: Two-Headed Cerberus
Two-Headed Cerberus.text: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

Wild Celebrants.flavor: "You can tell something's really valuable by the sound it makes when you slam your staff into it."
Wild Celebrants.name: Wild Celebrants
Wild Celebrants.text: When Wild Celebrants enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact.

Agent of Horizons.flavor: The light in the woods just before dawn reveals a glimmering network of branches, roots, and spiderwebs. The acolytes of Kruphix walk this lattice unseen.
Agent of Horizons.name: Agent of Horizons
Agent of Horizons.text: {2}{U}: Agent of Horizons can't be blocked this turn.

Anthousa, Setessan Hero.flavor: The warriors she leads can rarely keep pace with her, and neither can the tales.
Anthousa, Setessan Hero.name: Anthousa, Setessan Hero
Anthousa, Setessan Hero.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Anthousa, Setessan Hero, up to three target lands you control each become 2/2 Warrior creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

Arbor Colossus.name: Arbor Colossus
Arbor Colossus.text:
Reach
{3}{G}{G}{G}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Arbor Colossus becomes monstrous, destroy target creature with flying an opponent controls.

Artisan's Sorrow.flavor: Some seers read bones or entrails. Others just like to break things.
Artisan's Sorrow.name: Artisan's Sorrow
Artisan's Sorrow.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

Boon Satyr.name: Boon Satyr
Boon Satyr.text:
Flash
Bestow {3}{G}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Enchanted creature gets +4/+2.

Bow of Nylea.name: Bow of Nylea
Bow of Nylea.text:
Attacking creatures you control have deathtouch.
{1}{G}, {T}: Choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
• Bow of Nylea deals 2 damage to target creature with flying.
• You gain 3 life.
• Put up to four target cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your library in any order.

Centaur Battlemaster.flavor: "A herd is only as strong as its weakest. Our weakest just killed his third minotaur raider—today." —Braulios of Pheres Band
Centaur Battlemaster.name: Centaur Battlemaster
Centaur Battlemaster.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Centaur Battlemaster, put three +1/+1 counters on Centaur Battlemaster.

Commune with the Gods.flavor: For the first time in many years, Elspeth asked for help.
Commune with the Gods.name: Commune with the Gods
Commune with the Gods.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or enchantment card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

Defend the Hearth.flavor: The defenders said not a word. Their shields, spears, and stances were warning enough.
Defend the Hearth.name: Defend the Hearth
Defend the Hearth.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to players this turn.

Fade into Antiquity.flavor: "Are the gods angry at our discontent with what they give us, or jealous that we made a thing they cannot?" —Kleon the Iron-Booted
Fade into Antiquity.name: Fade into Antiquity

Feral Invocation.flavor: Nylea's sacred lynx guards those who honor the Nessian Wood and hunts those who don't.
Feral Invocation.name: Feral Invocation
Feral Invocation.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

Hunt the Hunter.flavor: "A grudge is a tattoo worn on the inside." —Setessan warrior saying
Hunt the Hunter.name: Hunt the Hunter
Hunt the Hunter.text: Target green creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. It fights target green creature an opponent controls.

Karametra's Acolyte.flavor: "The wilds are a garden tended by divine hands."
Karametra's Acolyte.name: Karametra's Acolyte
Karametra's Acolyte.text: {T}: Add an amount of {G} equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)

Leafcrown Dryad.name: Leafcrown Dryad
Leafcrown Dryad.text:
Bestow {3}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Reach
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has reach.

Mistcutter Hydra.name: Mistcutter Hydra
Mistcutter Hydra.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Haste, protection from blue
Mistcutter Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

Nemesis of Mortals.name: Nemesis of Mortals
Nemesis of Mortals.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.
{7}{G}{G}: Monstrosity 5. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each creature card in your graveyard. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put five +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

Nessian Asp.flavor: It's not the two heads you should fear. It's the four fangs.
Nessian Asp.name: Nessian Asp
Nessian Asp.text:
Reach
{6}{G}: Monstrosity 4. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

Nessian Courser.flavor: Khestes the Adamant, the Champion's closest ally among the centaurs, took one stone to his shoulder and another to his flank. He held his stride and his aim, and let fly the arrow that killed the giant Grinthax. —The Theriad
Nessian Courser.name: Nessian Courser

Nylea, God of the Hunt.name: Nylea, God of the Hunt
Nylea, God of the Hunt.text:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to green is less than five, Nylea isn't a creature. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)
Other creatures you control have trample.
{3}{G}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

Nylea's Disciple.name: Nylea's Disciple
Nylea's Disciple.text: When Nylea's Disciple enters the battlefield, you gain life equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)

Nylea's Emissary.name: Nylea's Emissary
Nylea's Emissary.text:
Bestow {5}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Trample
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has trample.

Nylea's Presence.name: Nylea's Presence
Nylea's Presence.text:
Enchant land
When Nylea's Presence enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted land is every basic land type in addition to its other types.

Ordeal of Nylea.name: Ordeal of Nylea
Ordeal of Nylea.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

Pheres-Band Centaurs.flavor: "Poets speak of your unrivaled speed," the Champion said to the assembled centaurs, "but it is plain to see that your true strength lies in your unwavering loyalty to one another." —The Theriad
Pheres-Band Centaurs.name: Pheres-Band Centaurs

Polukranos, World Eater.name: Polukranos, World Eater
Polukranos, World Eater.text:
{X}{X}{G}: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Polukranos, World Eater becomes monstrous, it deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures your opponents control. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its power to Polukranos.

Reverent Hunter.name: Reverent Hunter
Reverent Hunter.text: When Reverent Hunter enters the battlefield, put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)

Satyr Hedonist.flavor: "Any festival you can walk away from wasn't worth attending in the first place."
Satyr Hedonist.name: Satyr Hedonist

Satyr Piper.flavor: "When I asked my commander the reward for killing that prancing nuisance, he told me, 'None! I want to kill him myself!'" —Phrogas, soldier of Akros
Satyr Piper.name: Satyr Piper
Satyr Piper.text: {3}{G}: Target creature must be blocked this turn if able.

Savage Surge.flavor: "I thought its back was turned!" "A centaur has two backs!"
Savage Surge.name: Savage Surge
Savage Surge.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap that creature.

Sedge Scorpion.flavor: Thakolides the Mighty Slayer of minotaurs Vanquisher of giants Killed by a scorpion —Inscription on an Akroan grave
Sedge Scorpion.name: Sedge Scorpion
Sedge Scorpion.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

Shredding Winds.flavor: "Enemies of the wood! Your presence here is a slap in Nylea's face. Do not be surprised if she slaps back." —Telphe, druid of Nylea
Shredding Winds.name: Shredding Winds
Shredding Winds.text: Shredding Winds deals 7 damage to target creature with flying.

Staunch-Hearted Warrior.flavor: As soon as she faces a monster, she begins composing its epitaph.
Staunch-Hearted Warrior.name: Staunch-Hearted Warrior
Staunch-Hearted Warrior.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Staunch-Hearted Warrior, put two +1/+1 counters on Staunch-Hearted Warrior.

Sylvan Caryatid.flavor: Those who enter the copse never leave. They find peace there and take root, becoming part of the ever-growing grove.
Sylvan Caryatid.name: Sylvan Caryatid
Sylvan Caryatid.text:
Defender, hexproof
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

Time to Feed.name: Time to Feed
Time to Feed.text: Choose target creature an opponent controls. When that creature dies this turn, you gain 3 life. Target creature you control fights that creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

Voyaging Satyr.flavor: "None can own the land's bounty. The gods made this world for all to share its riches. And I'm not just saying that because you caught me stealing your fruit."
Voyaging Satyr.name: Voyaging Satyr

Vulpine Goliath.flavor: "With a diet of hydras, giants, and massive serpents, anything would get that big." —Corisande, Setessan hunter
Vulpine Goliath.name: Vulpine Goliath

Warriors' Lesson.flavor: "Let each challenge make you a better warrior." —Anthousa of Setessa
Warriors' Lesson.name: Warriors' Lesson
Warriors' Lesson.text: Until end of turn, up to two target creatures you control each gain "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card."

Akroan Hoplite.flavor: "Fair fight? How could it be a fair fight? We're Akroans. They're not."
Akroan Hoplite.name: Akroan Hoplite
Akroan Hoplite.text: Whenever Akroan Hoplite attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures you control.

Anax and Cymede.flavor: Akros's greatest heroes are also its royalty.
Anax and Cymede.name: Anax and Cymede
Anax and Cymede.text:
First strike, vigilance
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Anax and Cymede, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

Ashen Rider.flavor: One offering to appease her on her arrival. Another to celebrate her departure.
Ashen Rider.name: Ashen Rider
Ashen Rider.text:
Flying
When Ashen Rider enters the battlefield or dies, exile target permanent.

Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver.name: Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver
Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver.text:
+2: Exile the top three cards of target opponent's library.
−X: Put a creature card with converted mana cost X exiled with Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a Nightmare in addition to its other types.
−10: Exile all cards from all opponents' hands and graveyards.

Battlewise Hoplite.name: Battlewise Hoplite
Battlewise Hoplite.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Battlewise Hoplite, put a +1/+1 counter on Battlewise Hoplite, then scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Chronicler of Heroes.flavor: She paints pictures with words, though not all pictures show the truth.
Chronicler of Heroes.name: Chronicler of Heroes
Chronicler of Heroes.text: When Chronicler of Heroes enters the battlefield, draw a card if you control a creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.

Daxos of Meletis.name: Daxos of Meletis
Daxos of Meletis.text:
Daxos of Meletis can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.
Whenever Daxos of Meletis deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost. Until end of turn, you may cast that card and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

Destructive Revelry.flavor: "Stoke a fire hot enough and you'll never run out of things to burn." —Xenagos, the Reveler
Destructive Revelry.name: Destructive Revelry
Destructive Revelry.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Destructive Revelry deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.

Fleecemane Lion.name: Fleecemane Lion
Fleecemane Lion.text:
{3}{G}{W}: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.)
As long as Fleecemane Lion is monstrous, it has hexproof and indestructible.

Horizon Chimera.name: Horizon Chimera
Horizon Chimera.text:
Flash
Flying, trample
Whenever you draw a card, you gain 1 life.

Kragma Warcaller.flavor: A warcaller merely brings the herd together. After that, the meat-hunger is all the encouragement they need.
Kragma Warcaller.name: Kragma Warcaller
Kragma Warcaller.text:
Minotaur creatures you control have haste.
Whenever a Minotaur you control attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

Medomai the Ageless.name: Medomai the Ageless
Medomai the Ageless.text:
Flying
Whenever Medomai the Ageless deals combat damage to a player, take an extra turn after this one.
Medomai the Ageless can't attack during extra turns.

Pharika's Mender.flavor: "The direst venom becomes a panacea under Pharika's guidance. I bring it to the worthy, clinging at the edge of the abyss."
Pharika's Mender.name: Pharika's Mender
Pharika's Mender.text: When Pharika's Mender enters the battlefield, you may return target creature or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

Polis Crusher.name: Polis Crusher
Polis Crusher.text:
Trample, protection from enchantments
{4}{R}{G}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
Whenever Polis Crusher deals combat damage to a player, if Polis Crusher is monstrous, destroy target enchantment that player controls.

Prophet of Kruphix.flavor: "Time is fluid as a dance, and truth as fleeting."
Prophet of Kruphix.name: Prophet of Kruphix
Prophet of Kruphix.text:
Untap all creatures and lands you control during each other player's untap step.
You may cast creature spells as though they had flash.

Psychic Intrusion.name: Psychic Intrusion
Psychic Intrusion.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from that player's graveyard or hand and exile it. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

Reaper of the Wilds.name: Reaper of the Wilds
Reaper of the Wilds.text:
Whenever another creature dies, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{B}: Reaper of the Wilds gains deathtouch until end of turn.
{1}{G}: Reaper of the Wilds gains hexproof until end of turn.

Sentry of the Underworld.flavor: When Athreos gathers the newly dead to be ferried across the Five Rivers That Ring the World, he sends skeletal griffins to fetch those who stray.
Sentry of the Underworld.name: Sentry of the Underworld
Sentry of the Underworld.text:
Flying, vigilance
{W}{B}, Pay 3 life: Regenerate Sentry of the Underworld.

Shipwreck Singer.flavor: Her melody melds death and beauty with such artistry that even the gods weep to hear it.
Shipwreck Singer.name: Shipwreck Singer
Shipwreck Singer.text:
Flying
{1}{U}: Target creature an opponent controls attacks this turn if able.
{1}{B}, {T}: Attacking creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

Spellheart Chimera.flavor: Thaumaturges remain silent around chimeras, lest their words conjure even stranger beasts.
Spellheart Chimera.name: Spellheart Chimera
Spellheart Chimera.text:
Flying, trample
Spellheart Chimera's power is equal to the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

Steam Augury.flavor: Keranos is a fickle god, delivering punishment as readily as prophecy.
Steam Augury.name: Steam Augury
Steam Augury.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library and separate them into two piles. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put that pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

Triad of Fates.name: Triad of Fates
Triad of Fates.text:
{1}, {T}: Put a fate counter on another target creature.
{W}, {T}: Exile target creature that has a fate counter on it, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
{B}, {T}: Exile target creature that has a fate counter on it. Its controller draws two cards.

Tymaret, the Murder King.flavor: His memories remained in the Underworld, but his cruelty crossed the Rivers with him.
Tymaret, the Murder King.name: Tymaret, the Murder King
Tymaret, the Murder King.text:
{1}{R}, Sacrifice another creature: Tymaret, the Murder King deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Tymaret from your graveyard to your hand.

Underworld Cerberus.name: Underworld Cerberus
Underworld Cerberus.text:
Underworld Cerberus can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.
When Underworld Cerberus dies, exile it and each player returns all creature cards from their graveyard to their hand.

Xenagos, the Reveler.name: Xenagos, the Reveler
Xenagos, the Reveler.text:
+1: Add X mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G}, where X is the number of creatures you control.
0: Create a 2/2 red and green Satyr creature token with haste.
−6: Exile the top seven cards of your library. You may put any number of creature and/or land cards from among them onto the battlefield.

Akroan Horse.name: Akroan Horse
Akroan Horse.text:
Defender
When Akroan Horse enters the battlefield, an opponent gains control of it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent creates a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

Anvilwrought Raptor.flavor: "I know its lightness, for I have seen it fly. I know its weight, for I have seen it strike." —Brigone, soldier of Meletis
Anvilwrought Raptor.name: Anvilwrought Raptor

Bronze Sable.flavor: The Champion stood alone between the horde of the Returned and the shrine to Karametra, cutting down scores among hundreds. She would have been overcome if not for the aid of the temple guardians whom Karametra awakened. —The Theriad
Bronze Sable.name: Bronze Sable

Burnished Hart.flavor: Forged by divine hands to wander mortal realms.
Burnished Hart.name: Burnished Hart
Burnished Hart.text: {3}, Sacrifice Burnished Hart: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

Colossus of Akros.name: Colossus of Akros
Colossus of Akros.text:
Defender, indestructible
{10}: Monstrosity 10. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put ten +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
As long as Colossus of Akros is monstrous, it has trample and can attack as though it didn't have defender.

Flamecast Wheel.flavor: Beware the gifts of an ill-tempered forge god.
Flamecast Wheel.name: Flamecast Wheel
Flamecast Wheel.text: {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Flamecast Wheel: It deals 3 damage to target creature.

Fleetfeather Sandals.flavor: "The gods gave us no wings to fly, but they gave us an even greater gift: imagination." —Daxos of Meletis
Fleetfeather Sandals.name: Fleetfeather Sandals
Fleetfeather Sandals.text:
Equipped creature has flying and haste.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

Guardians of Meletis.flavor: The histories speak of two feuding rulers whose deaths were celebrated and whose monuments symbolized the end of their wars. In truth they were peaceful lovers, their story lost to the ages.
Guardians of Meletis.name: Guardians of Meletis

Opaline Unicorn.flavor: Purphoros once loved Nylea, the god of the hunt. His passion inspired his most astounding works of art.
Opaline Unicorn.name: Opaline Unicorn
Opaline Unicorn.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

Prowler's Helm.flavor: "The youths prattle on about heroic deeds, but avoiding the noose is a feat more daring than their entire careers." —Basarios the Blade
Prowler's Helm.name: Prowler's Helm
Prowler's Helm.text:
Equipped creature can't be blocked except by Walls.
Equip {2}

Pyxis of Pandemonium.name: Pyxis of Pandemonium
Pyxis of Pandemonium.text:
{T}: Each player exiles the top card of their library face down.
{7}, {T}, Sacrifice Pyxis of Pandemonium: Each player turns face up all cards they own exiled with Pyxis of Pandemonium, then puts all permanent cards among them onto the battlefield.

Traveler's Amulet.flavor: "What we call magic is nothing more than hope crystallized into a destination." —Perisophia the philosopher
Traveler's Amulet.name: Traveler's Amulet
Traveler's Amulet.text: {1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

Witches' Eye.flavor: The price of prophecy is a vacant eye socket.
Witches' Eye.name: Witches' Eye
Witches' Eye.text:
Equipped creature has "{1}, {T}: Scry 1." (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
Equip {1}

Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx.name: Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx
Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Choose a color. Add an amount of mana of that color equal to your devotion to that color. (Your devotion to a color is the number of mana symbols of that color in the mana costs of permanents you control.)

Temple of Abandon.name: Temple of Abandon
Temple of Abandon.text:
Temple of Abandon enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Abandon enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

Temple of Deceit.name: Temple of Deceit
Temple of Deceit.text:
Temple of Deceit enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Deceit enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

Temple of Mystery.name: Temple of Mystery
Temple of Mystery.text:
Temple of Mystery enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Mystery enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

Temple of Silence.name: Temple of Silence
Temple of Silence.text:
Temple of Silence enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Silence enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

Temple of Triumph.name: Temple of Triumph
Temple of Triumph.text:
Temple of Triumph enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Triumph enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

Unknown Shores.flavor: Philosophers speak of a place where myths wash like tides upon the shores of the real.
Unknown Shores.name: Unknown Shores
Unknown Shores.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
